src:
Watch Live: Donald Trump Hosts Political Rally in Mississippi
President Donald Trump will speak at a political rally on Friday in Mississippi.
02 Nov 2019 by Amanda House
The rally is scheduled to start at 7:00 p.m. local time (8:00 p.m. EST) in Tupelo, Mississippi.
